WorkItem.Description:
There are three items in the item cache for 4.1.5.0 called "Vicious Gladiator's Armwraps of Triumph", with item numbers as follows:
 
60598
60597
60588
 
They'd be quite nice Bear bracers, except that they don't actually seem to exist in-game.  Wowhead doesn't give a source for them, either.
 
The Alacrity (60594) and Accuracy (60591) bracers do seem to exist.
WorkItem.Summary: Vicious Gladiator's Armwraps of Triumph don't exist

Comments.Message: I have this fixed in my local build. I'm also double checking to make sure that all pvp is correct.
